p: The plant-based meat alternatives global market is projected to increase from USD 1.6 billion in 2019 to USD 3.5 billion by 2026 [ 13]. The top selling meat alternative products in 2019 were burger (USD 283 million), sausages and hot dogs (USD 159 million), and patties (USD 120 million) [ 14]. Other data show that meat sales have decreased by 5% from 2015 to 2019 in the US [ 11].
